title: If you're in bronze you should just uninstall.
body: You're clearly not getting better, go play Strife or something.

replies.body: If all the bronzes leave, you will be bronze soon.
BLAM Sackboy, your still alive and kicking? How is the rest of the old Forums GDrs doing do you know? or have they all died.

That is going easy on them... if you are bronze you should be deported to the africa and live in the jungle for the rest of your life. 
bronze player = subhuman
subhuman = natural habitat jungle.
